meaning: Person who likes beautiful pure love stories
description: Same as 「Pure Love God of War」 (chun ai zhan shen).

examples.chinese: 我还是不会看的,我们纯爱战士接受不了三人的纯爱哈
examples.translation: I still won't watch it, we pure love warriors can't accept a three-person pure love

examples.chinese: 太敢拍了,胆小慎看,纯爱战士勿入
examples.translation: So bold, cowardly people beware, pure love warriors do not enter

examples.chinese: 我看第一集就爱上了,现在已熬夜追剧,纯爱战士慎看
examples.translation: I fell in love after watching the first episode, now I'm staying up late watching the drama, pure love warriors beware
